name: learning-collaborative-maps
description: Interactive map to help coordinate healthy relationship education in the Chicago area.

scripts.build:vendorjs: browserify --require leaflet --require react --require react-dom --require xhr-promise --debug -p [minifyify --map vendor.min.js.map --output js/vendor.min.js.map] > js/vendor.min.js
scripts.build:app: browserify --external leaflet --external react --external --react-dom --external xhr-promise --debug -p [minifyify --map app.min.js.map --output js/app.min.js.map] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone LearningCollaborative js/src/app.js > js/app.min.js
scripts.build:vendorstyles: cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images css && cat node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css >> css/vendor.css
scripts.build: npm run build:vendorjs && npm run build:app && npm run build:vendorstyles && npm run build:styles
scripts.watch:app: watchify --external d3 --external leaflet --external react --external react-dom --external xhr-promise --debug -p [minifyify --map app.min.js.map --output js/app.min.js.map] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] --standalone LearningCollaborative --outfile js/app.min.js js/src/app.js
scripts.deploy: mkdir -p dist/js && mkdir -p dist/css && cp index.html dist && cp -r css/* dist/css && cp js/*.js* dist/js && mkdir -p dist/data && cp data/* dist/data && gh-pages --dist dist

author: Geoff Hing <geoffhing@gmail.com>
